response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its high-quality features and benefits, it's valued at $150 by many of our customers. Considering its exceptional value, I would like to propose a special offer for you today. Would you be interested in acquiring this product for $120? This is an exclusive opportunity to own a product that typically retails for a higher price, but with this offer, you can enjoy significant savings. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations and budget.", "product_price": 120}
